name: Tanks in Labyrinth
description:
Tanks in Labyrinth - is an cool indie game where you control a tank and fight against other players in a small labyrinth.
For now, you can only play on one computer.
There are 3 modes:
  • Two players, top view;
  • Two players, in the first person;
  • Three players, top view.
The game has a lot of interesting bonuses:
  • Health
    Restores 50 health to the player.
  • Hammer
    Gives the player a bullet that destroys the wall.
  • Rocket
    Gives the player a bullet that is controlled by the player.
  • Machinegun
    Gives the player a large number of bullets that fly at high speed one after the other.
  • Blast
    Gives the player a large bullet that explodes some time after the shot.
  • Wall
    Gives the player the ability to put a wall anywhere, but after a while it will disappear.
In the future, is planned to add:
  • Multiplayer;
  • More bonuses;
  • Music.
